optimize API reference¶

Data¶

class optimize.data.Data(label=None)¶

Bases: object

An base class for general datasets.

class optimize.data.MixedData¶

Bases: dict

class optimize.data.SimpleData(x, y, yerr, mask=None, label=None)¶

Bases: optimize.data.Data

A base class for simple datasets.

x¶

The effective independent variable.

Type

np.ndarray

y¶

The effective dependent variable.

Type

np.ndarray

yerr¶

The intrinsic errorbars for y.

Type

np.ndarray

mask¶

An array defining good (=1) and bad (=0) data points, must have the same shape as y. Defaults to None (all good data).

Type

np.ndarray

Constructs a general dataset.

Parameters

  • x (np.ndarray) – The effective independent variable.

  • y (np.ndarray) – The effective dependent variable.

  • mask (np.ndarray) – An array defining good (=1) and bad (=0) data points, must have the same shape as y. Defaults to None (all good data).

compute_errorbars(pars)¶

Computes the effective error bars after including additional white noise (“jitter”) terms. Errors are added in quadrature.

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters object containing the “jitter” parameter. If not present, the errorbars are returned.

Returns

The computed errorbars.

Return type

np.ndarray
